name: Brew: Acumen Philter
effect: Produces a cerulean solution of crushed pearl and gold dust, which forms at the top of an alchemical mixture. The reaction yields 1 ounce of product, which is stored in a vial. As an action, you may drink the contents of the vial, gaining 2 points of intelligence until the next long rest.
note: Consuming this potion has no effect if one's intelligence has already been increased by another potion.

casting_reqs.Materials: A pearl and a pile of gold dust, plus other ingredients costing 50 gold.

modifiers.Potency: Bonus intelligence is increased by an additional point for every 3 points of intelligence above 16 when the potion was brewed.

name: Brew: Amphibic Philter
effect: Produces a viscous extract, condensed from an alchemical mixture of frog feet and fish scales. The reaction yields 1 ounce of liquid, which is stored in a vial. As an action, you may drink the contents of the vial, gaining the ability to breathe underwater for 30 minutes.
note: Consuming this potion a second time resets the duration of the effect.

casting_reqs.Materials: Frog legs and fish scales, plus other ingredients costing 50 gold.

modifiers.Duration: Breathe underwater for an additional 30 minutes for every two points of intelligence above 14 when the potion was brewed.

name: Brew: Anaesthetic Potion
effect: Produces a transparent liquid, distilled from an alchemical solution of crushed glass and mermaid tears. The reaction yields 1 ounce of liquid, which is stored in a vial. As an action, you may drink the contents of the vial. You gain 1d6 temporary HP and 1d4 temporary AP, and your nerves are greatly dulled to the sensation of pain.

casting_reqs.Materials: A shard of glass and a vial of mermaid tears, plus other ingredients costing 30 gold.

modifiers.Potency: Additional 1d6 temporary HP for every 3 points of intelligence above 14 when the potion was brewed.

name: Brew: Antivenin
effect: A vile and brackish concoction. Nevertheless, one ounce is all that is required to cure ongoing poisons and ailments. The reaction yields 4 ounces of the substance, which are stored in a stoppered flask.

casting_reqs.Materials: The tail of a shrew and the wing of a bat, plus other ingredients costing 30 gold.

name: Brew: Curative Potion
effect: A crimson philter of lion or bear's blood is precipitated in alchemical solution. The reaction yields 4 ounces of liquid, which are stored in a stoppered flask. As an action, you may drink up to 4 ounces from the flask, healing 1d4 damage each.
note: If the potion is not consumed, the mixture denatures and becomes inert after a long rest.

casting_reqs.Materials: 1 ounce of fresh blood, taken from a lion or bear, plus additional materials costing 25 gold.

modifiers.Potency: For every two points of intelligence above 13, the healing per ounce increases. Healing progresses to 1d6 at 15, 1d8 at 17, and so on up to 1d12.

name: Brew: Elixir of Immortality
effect: A shimmering gold solution containing the essence of life is distilled from an alchemical solution. The reaction yields 1 ounce of liquid, stored in a vial. As an action, you may drink the contents of the vial, so extending your life by 500 years.

casting_reqs.Materials: Unknown, but invariably obtained at extreme price.

modifiers.Preparation Time: Brew time is reduced by 50% for every point of speed above 10.

name: Brew: Eloquence Philter
effect: A xanthous solution of egg yolk and four-leaf clovers is condensed from an alchemical mixture. The reaction yields 1 ounce of liquid, which is stored in a vial. As an action, you may drink the contents of the vial, gaining 1 point of charisma until the next long rest.
note: Consuming this potion has no effect if one's charisma has already been increased by another potion.

casting_reqs.Materials: 10 four leaf clovers, the yolk of a harpy's egg, plus other ingredients costing 50 gold.

modifiers.Potency: Charisma is increased by an additional point for every 3 points of intelligence above 15.

name: Brew: Invisibility Potion
effect: A glowing, translucent potion remains after aught else is boiled away. The reaction yields 1 ounce of liquid, which is stored in a vial. As an action, you may drink the contents of the vial, so becoming invisible for 10 minutes.

casting_reqs.Materials: A spiderweb, a glowing mushroom, and diamond dust, plus other ingredients costing 50 gold.

modifiers.duration: Invisibility is extended by 10 minutes for every point of intelligence above 17.

name: Brew: Elixir of Invulnerability
effect: A dark crimson concoction derived from crushed bricks, tar, and grass plucked from between the cracks of a sidewalk. The reaction yields 1 ounce of liquid, which is stored in a vial. As an action, you may drink the contents of the vial, gaining immunity to all forms of damage for 1 minute.

casting_reqs.Materials: A brick, a drop of tar, and freshly plucked grass, plus other ingredients costing 100 gold.

modifiers.maintenance: Its original properties can be restored via a ritual which takes 20 minutes and expends 4 AP.

name: Brew: Vigor Philter
effect: Produces an effervescent yellow potion which swirls without cessation. The reaction produces 1 ounce of product, which is stored in a vial. As an action, you may drink the contents of the vial, gaining 2 points of dexterity until the next long rest.
